results.title: Suna Asobi
results.synopsis:
Stop-motion animation using sand. Depicts a child going outside to play
 and exploring nature, rough-housing with friends, and using the full extent of his imagination.

results.title: Akichi Asobi: Playground
results.synopsis:
A boy is always alone, at school, or at home. One day, 
he finds a sandlot on the way home and thinks of making a ‘town’ of his own. Another boy was watching his play 
and starts to imitate him.
